bibl.title: with the assistance of Deborah DARNELL, and contributions by Deborah DARNELL, Renée FRIEDMAN, and Stan HENDRICKX, Theban Desert Road in the Egyptian Western Desert. I. Gebel Tjauti Rock Inscriptions 1-45 and Wadi el-Hôl Rock Inscriptions 1-45. (Oriental Institute Publications. 119.)
bibl.note: Textes hiéroglyphiques, démotiques et coptes. - Identification de deux textes grecs (Gebel Tjauti, No. 45; Wadi el-Hôl, No. 2) par: Jean BINGEN, Bulletin Épigraphique, REG 116 (2003) p. 679, No. 634.

DARNELL John Coleman, with the assistance of Deborah DARNELL, and contributions by Deborah DARNELL, Renée FRIEDMAN, and Stan HENDRICKX, Theban Desert Road in the Egyptian Western Desert. I. Gebel Tjauti Rock Inscriptions 1-45 and Wadi el-Hôl Rock Inscriptions 1-45. (Oriental Institute Publications. 119.)
Chicago, Oriental Institute, 2002, 4°, lvi-174 pp., 2 figg. et 126 pll. ISBN 1-885923-17-1. $75.
